quote: When you don't have another option, but for it to work, it has to work. And you figure out how to make it work.
why_clipworthy: This statement captures the essence of resilience and determination.
suggested_hook: What would you do if you had no other option but to succeed?

quote: I would go to a coffee shop and buy everyone's coffee for two hours. They'd come introduce themselves to me.
why_clipworthy: This is a unique and actionable networking strategy.
suggested_hook: Want to build your network fast? Try this unconventional tactic.
